{"id":941857256,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1682822631,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"71 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/941857256/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Determine the Winner of a Bowling Game","memory":"71.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int isWinner(vector<int>& player1, vector<int>& player2) {\n        int n = player1.size();\n        if(n == 0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        int sum1 = player1[0], sum2 = player2[0];\n        \n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            if(i == 1){\n                if(player1[i-1] == 10){\n                    sum1 += player1[i]*2;    \n                }\n                else{\n                    sum1 += player1[i];\n                }\n                if(player2[i-1] == 10){\n                    sum2 += player2[i]*2;    \n                }\n                else{\n                    sum2 += player2[i];\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                if(player1[i-1] == 10 || player1[i-2] == 10){\n                    sum1 += player1[i]*2;\n                }\n                else{\n                    sum1 += player1[i];\n                }\n                if(player2[i-1] == 10 || player2[i-2] == 10){\n                    sum2 += player2[i]*2;\n                }\n                else{\n                    sum2 += player2[i];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        if(sum1>sum2){\n            return 1;\n        }\n        else if(sum2>sum1){\n            return 2;\n        }\n        else{\n            return 0;\n        }\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"determine-the-winner-of-a-bowling-game","has_notes":false}
